Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the Oswego county correctional facility
Summary: Relates to authorizing the Oswego county correctional facility to also be used for the detention of persons under arrest being held for arraignment in any court located in the county of Oswego.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to authorizing the Oswego county correctional facility to also be used for the detention of persons under arrest being held for arraignment in any court located in the county of Oswego
